description: Dori and Gura are twin archers serving under Oboro. There are several ways to tell them apart. For one, Dori has purple eyes while Gura`s are blue. Also, the bottom part of Dori`s clothes is blue while with Gura they are red. They are very androgynous, and as such their gender is difficult to ascertain, even by other characters.
name: Guraa
